description: This file serves as the main index page for a database visualizer web application. It contains HTML structure, CSS styles, and embedded JavaScript code to display a list of databases, their tables, and visualized table data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and inserts HTML table for data display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for each cell, handling nulls, objects, and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
